a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

questions: Initially, published work on NMT was conducted by *well-resourced* academic research groups in *North America* and *Europe* as cost, power and data requirements were an obstacle for *NMT development*. This has changed for two reasons. Research groups were struggling to *compete* in major European languages and they focused on under-resource and *minority languages*. Moreover, back-translating *monolingual data* determined the ability of creating ‘synthetic’ data, which led to a *quality improvement* for low-resource languages.
